physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: awake and alert, talkative; Cardiovascular: Regular Rate and Rhythm (RRR); Lungs: Clear to Auscultation (CTA) bilaterally; Abdomen: soft, non-tender (NT), non-distended (ND), positive bowel sounds (+BS), incision clean, dry, intact (C/D/I), no erythema or hematoma; Extremities: warm, no edema.
